title: Protesters blocking entrance to Presidential Secretariat removed
body_lines: Protesters, who commenced a protest by blocking two other entrances to the Presidential Secretariat in Galle Face last night, were removed and taken into police custody a short while ago.
The structurs that were erected by blocking the entrances were also removed by the police.
The protesters started a protest by blocking all the entrances to the Presidential Secretariat from last night whereas only the main entrace was blocked until last night.
